mapper.insert: insert into xm_gl_bqly (xmjbxx_id, bqly_dm, bqlx_sz, qybj, czrq, xgrq, user_dm) values (#{xmjbxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bqlyDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bqlxSz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER})

xmbqly_id,
xmjbxx_id,
bqly_dm,
bqlx_sz,

mapper.update:
update xm_gl_bqly
xmjbxx_id = #{xmjbxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bqly_dm = #{bqlyDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bqlx_sz = #{bqlxSz,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where xmbqly_id = #{xmbqlyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update xm_gl_bqly set xmjbxx_id = #{xmjbxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bqly_dm = #{bqlyDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bqlx_sz = #{bqlxSz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER} where xmbqly_id = #{xmbqlyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from xm_gl_bqly x INNER JOIN dm_cs_bqly d where x.xmjbxx_id = #{xmId} and x.bqly_dm = d.bqly_dm and x.qybj = 1 and d.bqlybj = #{type}
mapper.update: update xm_gl_bqly x, dm_cs_bqly d set x.qybj = 0 where x.bqly_dm = d.bqly_dm and x.qybj = 1 and x.xmjbxx_id = #{xmId} and d.bqlybj = #{type}
update xm_gl_bqly set qybj = 0 where xmjbxx_id = #{projectId}
